name: 100% Hidden Objects 2
description:
Don’t like complicated stories? Can’t wait to solve the next puzzle and find all the hidden objects?

In an exciting journey around the world, 100% Hidden Objects 2 offers you picturesque hidden-object scenes just waiting for your keen eye to spot all the clues within them. Whether you prefer to play in classic mode with a checklist, or would like to track down the objects using pictograms:
100% Hidden Objects 2 provides pure hidden object fun! Try the first game world for free, then unlock the full adventure from within the game!

Play at your own pace or against the clock and find all the hidden objects! Can you do it?

Features:
- Endless hidden-object fun with thousands of objects
- 5 different game worlds*: North America, South America, Europe, Asia and Africa
- 2 different game modes
- Earn coins and tools to help you in your search


*Attention: Only the first game world is available for free. The others must be unlocked via In-App Purchase. Using any In-App Purchase automatically removes the advertisements from the game.
